Introducing BWB Texts

 

BWB Texts offer a new form of reading for New Zealanders.
 

Commissioned as short digital-only works, BWB Texts unlock diverse stories, insights and analysis from the best of our past, present and future New Zealand writing.
 

The team behind BWB Texts: at BWB, Tom Rennie and Bridget Williams; commissioning editors: Geoff Walker and Max Rashbrooke.
 

Visit www.bwb.co.nz for more information on BWB Texts - including Texts by Sir Paul Callaghan, Maurice Gee, Kathleen Jones, Hamish Campbell and Sir Tipene O'Regan.
 

BWB Texts is made possible by funding support from the BWB Publishing Trust.
